name: Sworn Knight Commander Genevra's Helmet
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ The Action Probability Estimator drops in Sector 13 and can be used for various tradeskill processes. #L "Action Probability Estimator" "257960" #L "Sworn Knight's Helmet" "225514" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Action Probability Estimator + Sworn Knight's Helmet = #L "Sworn Knight Commander Genevra's Helmet" "257114"
